data.text: @_MaccaNZ If we deducted everyone with covid who had an underlying condition, there'd be very few left on the list. If we include every death of someone with covid in the death toll, it'd be a much longer list. Funny how 'the truth' can mean very different things.

@_MaccaNZ Funny how every single death of every single person with covid was a COVID DEATH, according to the govt back before its border failed... now, the MOH tries to find a way to make every single death of every single person with covid somehow NOT REALLY COVID...
